description: As upper right triangle, number of weakly unimodal partitions of n where initial part is k (n >= k >= 1).
comments: Weakly unimodal means nondecreasing then nonincreasing.
formula: T(n, k) = S(n, k) - S(n-k, k) + Sum_j[T(n-k, j)] for j >= k, where S(n, k) = A008284(n, k) = Sum_j[S(n-k, j)] for n>k >= j [note reversal] with S[n, n] = 1.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 01 2001
